channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump is deploying 2,000 California National Guard troops over governor’s objections to LA to quell protests
item.description: DHS said in a statement that recent ICE operations in Los Angeles resulted in the arrest of 118 immigrants.

item.title: Hero or Traitor? Ernest Wilimowski, a Long-Dead Soccer Star, Is Revived, and Reviled.
item.description: Efforts in the Polish region of Silesia to honor Ernest Wilimowski, a local star who played for the national teams of both Poland and Nazi Germany, ar...

item.title: Trump’s Self-Dealing Is More Alarming Than You Think
item.description: The United States is becoming just another country with a corrupt strongman personalizing and profiting from power.

item.title: Italians Prepare to Vote in Citizenship Referendum
item.description: A referendum on Sunday and Monday will give Italians the chance to loosen citizenship laws for immigrants. But it is not clear enough voters will turn...

item.title: Trump Is Calling Up National Guard Troops Under a Rarely Used Law
item.description: President Trump bypassed the authority of Gov. Gavin Newsom to call up 2,000 National Guard troops to quell immigration protests.

item.title: Japan Flexes Its Military Muscle at China, and Trump

item.title: Colombian Senator Miguel Uribe Is Shot at Campaign Event
item.description: The condition of Miguel Uribe, who belongs to a conservative party and was seeking to be its presidential nominee, was not immediately clear.

item.title: Hong Kong Looks for Ways to Win Back Big-Spending Tourists
item.description: A city with an image dented by protests, pandemic restrictions and a security crackdown hopes to broaden its appeal beyond budget-minded visitors from...

item.title: Trump says his relationship with Musk is over, slamming the door on the once-staunch ally who tried to de-escalate their feud
item.description: Trump added that he has "no intention of speaking" to Musk anytime soon, saying "I’m too busy doing other things.”

item.title: China approves some exports of rare earths ahead of US talks
item.description: Delegations from Beijing and Washington are scheduled to meet in the UK to conduct trade negotiations on Monday.

item.title: Salmonella outbreak tied to eggs sickens dozens across 7 states
item.description: The August Egg Company recalled about 1.7 million brown organic and brown cage-free egg varieties distributed to grocery stores between February and M...

item.title: A hot trend in the housing market is Gen Z buying homes with siblings
item.description: BofA found that 22% of Gen Z homeowners bought their home with siblings, surging from 12% in 2024 and just 4% in 2023.
